content.body:
The Holiday Hours feature allows you to specify your business hours on days when your business has an irregular schedule, like holidays or special events. If you prefer to do this by uploading a spreadsheet, see [Add holiday hours through spreadsheet upload](https://help.yext.com/hc/en\-us/articles/360000002983).





You can also update holiday hours directly from your smartphone using the [Knowledge Assistant](https://help.yext.com/hc/en\-us/articles/115005975243\-How\-to\-use\-Knowledge\-Assistant).





To add holiday hours:





1. Click **Knowledge Graph**in the navigation bar and click **Entities**.
2. Click on the entity you would like to edit.



   * To edit multiple entities at once, visit the [Edit Entities in Bulk](https://help.yext.com/hc/en\-us/articles/4404675809819) article.




3. Click **Business Details** in the left sidebar.
4. Click on the **Hours (Holiday Hours)** field.
5. Click on the calendar icon and select the desired date.
6. Click **Open** to select the option that best represents your holiday hours. If the hours are the same as your normal business hours, select **Regular Hours**.
7. If you selected **Split** or **Open**, specify the correct hours.



   * Split hours defaults to two sets of hours. To add additional intervals, click on the **+ Add an interval** link and specify the correct hours.




8. Click **+ Add Another** to add additional dates.
9. Click **Save**. Your business hours will now update for the dates specified, then automatically revert back.





![holiday_hours_gif.gif](https://help.yext.com/hc/article_attachments/5360874571419/holiday_hours_gif.gif)
